page.title: 07Education in Barrhead
page.content: There are two{nursery schools in Barrhead,Arthurlie nursery and St.John's nursery.These schools are non_denominational.Children attend nurseries between the ages of three to five,usually for half a day only. Children aged five to twelve go to {primary}schools.In Barrhead there are four non_denominational shhools _ Auchenback,Carlibar,Cross Arthurlie and Springhill and two R.C.schools _St.John's and St.Mark's. There are{two secondary schools}in Barrhead_ Barrhead High and St.Luke's. Pupils progress from 1st to 6th years if following an academic course. O_Grade examinations are taken in 4th year(age 16)and H_Grade examinations can be taken in 5th and 6th years. The minimum school leaving age is 16.
